lpliu2000 wrote:

> I built a junit test class, and want to build multiple test cases
> using this class by passing different jvmargs(running junit test
> cases with ant). Can anyone tell me how
> to do this?

Look through this archive for "Parameterized Test Case" /or/ try using 
the FIT framework and FitNesse (http://fitnesse.org).
